game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact in the ruins.
game.description: Embark on a journey to locate the lost artifact in the forgotten ruins deep within the jungle.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and the favor of the king

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: A local elder claims to have knowledge of the ruins' location. Speak with him in the nearby village.
Navigate through the treacherous jungle filled with dangerous beasts and natural hazards.
